EmailTemplate.subject: Univar Invites you to Order Products Online
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Univar invites you to order your products online as an eBusiness Partner!
The eBusiness Partners program is free to Univar customers - it takes just minutes to register.
As an eBusiness Partner, you can:
-Place orders online -View order status -View, print, save documents -(MSDS, Certificates of Analysis) -View product information
Place your next order online! Go to: http://www.univarusa.com/vwr-inc/partnerregistration.nsf/Customer?OpenForm
Use your Customer and Ship-to numbers to register: Customer number: {!Account.CustomerNumber__c} Ship-To: {!Account.ShipToNumber__c}
Want to learn more? Go to: http://www.univarusa.com/pagesi/ebusiness.htm
